statement.title: Content
statement.content:
Can you calculate $lcm(\binom{n}{0},\binom{n}{1},\binom{n}{2},...,\binom{n}{n})$.

$lcm$ is the least common multiple.

$\binom{n}{i}=\frac{n!}{i!(n-i)!}$.

This is the fourth sentence.

statement.title: Standard Input
statement.content: There is only one integer $n(2\leq n\leq 1000000)$ in the first line.

statement.title: Samples
statement.content:
Input Output
2 2
